name: Evil Clown
description:
Finetuned from 50 high quality chosen images.

This model has a evil bias producing scary clown with great fidelity.

You don't need any specific trigger words. Any clown related prompt will result in a strong level of evil.

This is an example of the bias versus SD1.5 using only the prompt: Clown

Based on SD1.5

Please use vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-recommended VAE for optimal results

Use 768x768 for best results

Prompt Examples:

Prompt: creepy photo of a clown in the middle surrounded by zombies, scary atmosphere. dark night time photography style with flash and lights on at an old house fire is burning down everywhere all around them cinematic lighting 8k hyper realistic detailed masterpiece painting render highly symmetrical intricate octane unreal engine redshift hd artstation deviantart close up portrait behance cgsociety concept volumetric light
Steps: 30, Sampler: Euler a, CFG scale: 7, Seed: 1073711422, Size: 768x768,

modelVersions.name: v1.0
